mapper.select: select t1.id as "activityId" ,t1.acti_type as "activityType" ,t1.acti_name as "activityName" ,date_format(t1.acti_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "activityStartTime" ,date_format(t1.acti_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "activityEndTime" ,date_format(t1.apply_start_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "applyStartTime" ,date_format(t1.apply_end_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "applyEndTime" ,date_format(t1.mes_send_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "mesSenTime" ,t1.acti_address as "activityAdress" ,t1.acti_cost as "actiCost" ,t1.acti_organizer as "activityOrganizer" ,t1.acti_number as "activityNumber" ,t1.acti_poster_url as "activityPosterUrl" ,t1.acti_views as "activityViews" ,t1.acti_like as "activityLike" ,t1.apply_num as "applyNum" ,t1.partic_num as "particNum" ,t1.state as "state" ,date_format(t1.create_time , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createTime" ,t1.create_account as "createAccount" ,date_format(t1.issue_time ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "issueTime" ,t1.issue_account as "issueAccount" ,date_format(t1.update_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "updateTime" ,t1.update_account as "updateAccount" ,t1.is_index as "isIndex" ,t1.is_apply as "isApply" ,t1.show_apply_num as "showApplyNum" ,t2.acti_detail as "activityDetail" from tb_activity t1 left join tb_activity_detail t2 on t1.id=t2.activity_id where 1=1 and t1.id=#{id} and t1.state not in ('1','5') order by t1.create_time

select t1.id as "id" ,t1.p_id as "pId" ,t1.com_account as "comAccount" ,date_format(t1.com_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "comTime" ,t1.like_num as "likeNum" ,t1.state as "state" ,t1.com_type as "comType" ,t1.com_content as "comContent" ,case when t2.avatar is not null and t3.avatar is null then t2.avatar when t2.avatar is null and t3.avatar is not null then t3.avatar else t2.avatar end as "avatar" ,(select count(1) from tb_comment tt2 where tt2.p_id=t1.id) as "childNum" from tb_comment t1 left join tb_user_person t2 on t1.com_account =t2.account left join tb_user_company t3 on t1.com_account=t3.account where 1=1 and t1.p_id=#{id} and t1.state='1' order by t1.com_time

select t1.id as "id" ,t1.activity_id as "activityId" ,t1.account as "account" ,date_format(t1.apply_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "applyTime" ,t1.apply_state as "applyState" ,t1.sign_state as "signState" ,date_format(t1.sign_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "signTime" ,t1.sign_type as "signType" ,case when t2.avatar is not null and t3.avatar is null then t2.avatar when t2.avatar is null and t3.avatar is not null then t3.avatar else t2.avatar end as "avatar" from tb_activity_apply t1 left join tb_user_person t2 on t1.account=t2.account left join tb_user_company t3 on t1.account=t3.account where 1=1 and t1.activity_id=#{activityId} and t1.account=#{account} and t1.apply_state='1'
